analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/33/0x535aba3a82499c10075e3765df166bf737874b88.sol:
	Contract BETA has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x535aba3a82499c10075e3765df166bf737874b88.sol#208)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x535aba3a82499c10075e3765df166bf737874b88.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x535aba3a82499c10075e3765df166bf737874b88.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x535aba3a82499c10075e3765df166bf737874b88.sol#82) is not in mixedCase
